description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB provider for SQL Server:

1. Download the appropriate update package based on your Windows version from the links below.
2. Install the update by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Restart your system for the changes to take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses an integer overflow issue that could lead to remote code execution.
- Update packages can be found at:
  - [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
  - [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)
  - [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure your system is running a compatible Windows build as outlined in the post.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
